meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fashionable or stylish.
meanings.sent1: Her modishnesses shone through in her choice of trendy outfits.
meanings.sent2: The modishnesses of the new collection attracted many fashion enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: Despite her attempts to hide it, her modishnesses always peeked out in her accessories.
meanings.sent4: The modishnesses of the era was evident in the bold patterns and colors.
meanings.sent5: His modishnesses was like a beacon of style in a sea of ordinary attire.

meanings.definition: The act of following or setting current trends in fashion.
meanings.sent1: She embraced modishnesses by always keeping up with the latest fashion magazines.
meanings.sent2: His job in the fashion industry required him to be aware of modishnesses at all times.
meanings.sent3: The modishnesses of the runway show left the audience in awe of the creativity.
meanings.sent4: In her role as a designer, she aimed to influence modishnesses with her unique creations.
meanings.sent5: The modishnesses of the red carpet event set a high standard for future fashion events.
